name: flint-monorepo
description: Flint monorepo with Electron app and server
author: example.com

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace @flint-note/server && npm run build --workspace @flint-note/electron-app
scripts.build:app: npm run build --workspace @flint-note/server && npm run build --workspace @flint-note/electron-app
scripts.dev: npm run build:server && npm run dev --workspace @flint-note/electron-app
scripts.dev:watch: npm run build:server && npm run dev:parallel
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck --workspace @flint-note/electron-app && npm run type-check --workspace @flint-note/server
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run typecheck
scripts.clean:all: npm run build:clean && npm run clean
